document.title: Changing class names and formal generics

list.item: Start pick-and-drop on the class bubble of which you want to change the name or formal generics.

Drop it in the Change class name and generics hole.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_class_header_color.gif

The Class header dialog appears. You can enter a new name and/or formal generics.
/images/eiffelstudio/diagram/diagram-classheader.png

If you changed the name, choose between these options:
Change name locally: the name will be changed in the class declaration only. Any references to this one are now invalid.
Global search/replace of name in compiled classes: like the option above, but every reference to the class in compiled classes are also replaced with the new name.
Global search/replace of name in entire universe: like the option above, but references are replaced even in classes that are not in the system.
